```{r}
graph_data <- trends_data %>% group_by(monthorweek, high_income) %>% summarize(mean(index))
ggplot(graph_data, aes(x = monthorweek, y = `mean(index)`, color = high_income)) + geom_point() + geom_line() + geom_smooth(method = 'lm') + geom_vline(xintercept = as.Date('2015-09-01'))
